mapper.select: select p_code, p.id as id, s.m_code as m_code, m_name, m_photo, p_friends, p_complete, p_photo, m_date, m_carbon, m_point from member m, participation p, mission s where p.id =m.id and s.m_code = p.m_code and p.id=#{id} order by p_code
mapper.insert: insert into participation ( p_code, id, m_code, p_friends) values ( p_code, #{id}, #{m_code}, #{p_friends} )
